languages.text: {n}Вы резко срываетесь с места, но вас подводят слабые ноги. Свободная рука конюха хватает ваши волосы, перед глазами пляшут черные мушки.{/n}
{n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы резко срываетесь с места, но вас подводят слабые ноги. Свободная рука конюха хватает ваши волосы, перед глазами пляшут черные мушки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}
{n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}
{n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}
{n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}
{n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}
{n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你向前冲了过去，但你的双腿过于孱弱，无力奔跑。马夫用另一只手扯住了你的头发，你感觉眼前浮现出了无数黑点。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你向前冲了过去，但你的双腿过于孱弱，无力奔跑。马夫用另一只手扯住了你的头发，你感觉眼前浮现出了无数黑点。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Echas a correr, pero tus piernas son débiles y te fallan. El hombre te tira del pelo con la mano que tiene libre. Tu vista se llena de puntitos negros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Echas a correr, pero tus piernas son débiles y te fallan. El hombre te tira del pelo con la mano que tiene libre. Tu vista se llena de puntitos negros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Öne atılıyorsun ama zayıf bacakların seni yüzüstü bırakıyor. Adam, boştaki eliyle saçını yakalıyor. Gözlerinin önünde siyah noktacıklar dans ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Öne atılıyorsun ama zayıf bacakların seni yüzüstü bırakıyor. Adam, boştaki eliyle saçını yakalıyor. Gözlerinin önünde siyah noktacıklar dans ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは前に向かって走るが、弱った足ではうまくいかない。男は空いている方の手であなたの髪を掴む。目の前に黒い斑点が飛び跳ねる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは前に向かって走るが、弱った足ではうまくいかない。男は空いている方の手であなたの髪を掴む。目の前に黒い斑点が飛び跳ねる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous ruez en avant, mais vos jambes, trop faibles, se dérobent. L'homme vous agrippe les cheveux de sa main libre. Des taches noires dansent devant vos yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous ruez en avant, mais vos jambes, trop faibles, se dérobent. L'homme vous agrippe les cheveux de sa main libre. Des taches noires dansent devant vos yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du springst nach vorn, doch deine schwachen Beine versagen. Der Mann packt dich mit der freien Hand an den Haaren. Schwarze Flecken tanzen vor deinen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dash forward, but your weak legs fail you. The man grabs your hair with his free hand. Black spots dance before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du springst nach vorn, doch deine schwachen Beine versagen. Der Mann packt dich mit der freien Hand an den Haaren. Schwarze Flecken tanzen vor deinen Augen.{/n}
